channel.title: We will die without tutorials
channel.description:
People will come here for tutorials, and then stay for help, and then stay to continue.
Tutorials are the foundation here, we seriously need some ASAP

item.title: We will die without tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I was always under the impression we were making tutorials first, until we announced it -.- We launched backwarda.

Read full topic

item.title: We will die without tutorials
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

I actually think it was a bad idea to open this place up before even having tutorials…
Wish I could contribute something, but my skills are a bit too lacking as of this moment.

But that might change, I’ve got a college project which involves gaming, perhaps I’ll learn a thing or two from that that could be useful.

Read full topic

item.title: We will die without tutorials
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Sounds good, but I think we need more tutorials telling them how to do things and let them create their own games. Like show them how to draw, apply movement, jump, another tutorial for making a gun shoot in 2d, and then let them take those places. Right now we’re just showing them how to remake games. Id say pong and stickrpg should be the only remakes we should have. Then we need to elaborate on multiplayer, collision, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: We will die without tutorials
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Okay–my next to projects planned are:

-Recreation of the game Fishy: http://www.addictinggames.com/adventure-games/fishy.jsp
-Recreation of the game Stick RPG: http://www.stickpage.com/stickrpgplay.shtml

I may do Defend Your Castle, too. The last two are especially customizable by the community, and stick rpg in particular will require scripting and systems, such as combat. I probably will do Fishy, Defend Your Castle, then Stick RPG for order of more advancement. After Stick RPG, maybe I could do an online pokemon game to finalize the idea of roleplaying and introduce networking. After that, maybe 3D all the way.

Thoughts on this plan?

Read full topic
